author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR adds modifier(s) for ECAL component study. This is based on recipe in https://gitlab.cern.ch/-/snippets/2648

#### PR validation:
Test with following cmsDriver:

cmsDriver.py ZEE_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN -n 100 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --beamspot HLLHC14TeV --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry Extended2026D95 --era Phase2C17I13M9,ecal_component_finely_sampled_waveforms --python step0_ZEE.py --no_exec --fileout file:step0.root  --nThreads 8

cmsDriver.py step1 -s SIM -n -1 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --beamspot HLLHC14TeV --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry Extended2026D95 --era Phase2C17I13M9,ecal_component_finely_sampled_waveforms --python step1_SIM_ECAL.py --no_exec --filein file:step0.root --fileout file:step1_ECAL.root  --nThreads 8 --customise SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration/aging.customise_aging_1000

cmsDriver.py step2 -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1TrackTrigger,L1,DIGI2RAW,HLT:@relval2026 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n -1 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry Extended2026D95 --era Phase2C17I13M9,ecal_component_finely_sampled_waveforms --python step2_DIGI_ECAL.py --no_exec --filein  file:step1_ECAL.root  --fileout file:step2_ECAL.root  --nThreads 8
 
cmsDriver.py step3  -s RAW2DIGI,RECO,RECOSIM,PAT,VALIDATION:@phase2Validation+@miniAODValidation,DQM:@phase2+@miniAODDQM --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T21 --datatier DQMIO -n -1 --eventcontent DQM --geometry Extended2026D95 --era Phase2C17I13M9,ecal_component_finely_sampled_waveforms --python step3_RECO_ECAL.py --no_exec --filein  file:step2_ECAL.root  --fileout file:step3_ECAL.root  --nThreads 8 --customise SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration/aging.customise_aging_1000

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
It may backport to 13_0 to avoid long customization in production, but not really need.
title: Add modifiers for ECal component study
